text: "Happier" is a 2018 song by American DJ Marshmello and British band Bastille. It peaked at number two in Canada, the United Kingdom and the United States. It went to the top ten in Austria, Belgium, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, the Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Sweden and Switzerland. == References == Category:2018 songs Category:Marshmello songs Category:Bastille (band) songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Happier (Marshmello and Bastille song)
